content:
Hello whoever is reading this! This is my first post on my blog ever. Perhaps no one will ever read these posts, but that’s fine! I’m writing these to have a nice public journal of my efforts in game and software development.
I won’t announce what I’m making yet, but I’m getting started. I have 1 game and 1 piece of software I’m planning to develop over the coming months.
I really don’t have much to say here. I plan to focus this blog on my development and not on myself, so I don’t really want to give some big introduction.
I hope one day you’re reading this blog and eagerly awaiting my next post because you’re so excited for my game or software to come out. I’ve created this blog with the hope that one day someone gets to experience that joy that I’ve felt before.
Thanks for reading!
Here’s a wreath I drew last year.
summary:
Hello whoever is reading this! This is my first post on my blog ever. Perhaps no one will ever read these posts, but that’s fine! I’m writing these to have a nice public journal of my efforts in game and software development.
I won’t announce what I’m making yet, but I’m getting started. I have 1 game and 1 piece of software I’m planning to develop over the coming months.
title: My Goals

content: I make games. Currently, I haven’t released any. Stay tuned for future updates.
